actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.
Reported to House from the Committee on Agriculture, H. Rept. 93-1105.

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Agriculture and Forestry, S. Rept. 93-1042.

official_title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Act of 1970 to change the date on which the President must report to Congress concerning Government assisted services to rural areas.

summary.text: (LATEST SUMMARY) Changes from September 1 to May 15 the date on which the President must report to Congress concerning Government assisted services to rural areas. Revises the Agriculture Act of 1970 by providing that any security based on or backed by a trust or pool of loans or loan participations guaranteed or insured under the Rural Electrification Act of 1936 or the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act may be guaranteed as to timely payment of principal and interest by the Government National Mortgage Association.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Act of 1970 to change the date on which the President must report to Congress concerning Government assisted services to rural areas.
